author: Ashleigh Fields
description: The government shutdown has now lasted for about four days in a faceoff between Republicans standing strong on their non-negotiables and Democrats holding firm to their demands to prioritize funding for health care.  House GOP lawmakers returned to their districts on Friday for designated “work periods” at the direction of Speaker Mike Johnson (R-La.), who…
title: Sunday show preview: Government shutdown stretches into weekend; Trump layoffs loom

author: Ryan Mancini
description: President Trump took a victory lap Saturday after Israel and Hamas signaled support for his 20-point peace plan, but he pressed the Palestinian militant group to “move quickly.” Hamas partially agreed to the agreement crafted by Trump and Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Friday. “I appreciate that Israel has temporarily stopped the bombing in…
title: Trump urges Hamas to move quickly on peace deal

author: Ashleigh Fields
description: A federal worker union sued the Trump administration on Friday due to automatic email responses from employees at the Education Department that blame Democrats for the government shutdown. The American Federation of Government Employees (AFGE) represented by the Democracy Forward and Public Citizen Litigation Group sent a cease and desist letter, and also filed a…
title: Federal worker union sues over Education Department shutdown emails
